title: ee puranamulu
sahitya:
ee puranamulu enta vedikina
sripati daasulu cheDa rennaDunu

1

hari virahitamulu avi konnaLLaku
virasambulu mari viphalamulu 
narahari golichitu nammina varamulu
nirathamu lennaDu nelavulu cheDavu

2

kamalakhuni matin gaanani chaduvulu
kumatambulu bahu kupadhamulu
jamaLi achyutuni samaraadhanalu
vimalamule kaani vithadhamu kaavu 

3

sri vallabhuni gatin jerani padavulu 
daavatulu kapata dharamulu
sri venkatapati sevinchu sevalu
paavanamu ladhika bhagyapu sirulu
